entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 07:36 AM MDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 07:36 AM MDT Saturday 18 March 2023
